description:
Welcome to the course "Dividend Decision - A Comprehensive Study"

Dividend Decision is one of the key decision which the management has to take because it influence the future direction of the company.

At times, companies may have to retain dividends and at times, they have to declare divided and these decision depends upon the profitable investment opportunities ahead. Hence the importance for Dividend Decision.

In this course you will learn about

a) What is Dividend?

b) Technical Terms associated with Dividend

c) Dates associated with Dividend

d) Relationship between Dividend and Market Price

e) Various Dividend Models

f) Dividend Policy

with supporting case studies.

Finance students and executives and professional course students like CA, CMA , CS, CPA, CFA, CIMA, etc, can take this course.

This course is structured in self paced learning style.

Concepts were explained in note book writing style.

Take this course to have better clarity in basics of derivatives.
title: Dividend Decision - A Comprehensive Study
instructors: CA Raja Natarajan, B.Com., PGDBA, FCA
